item.title: CRUD SQL queries
item.description: The following steps will help you get started as quickly as possible, manipulating SQL data. Intro Lets create a customer or two, Assuming you have installed and configured, Its time to get the hang of CRUD on your fresh database. So given we need to store customers in our database, we create customers table, in which we store informations like: First name Last name Email Age In theory, First Name and Last Name or Email, are a text, in SQL, there is many text types, but to keep it simple we will use VARCHAR, think of it as a string type, but with a predefined max length we provide, 150 in our case is the maximum number of charachters for a first name or last name.
